column2: yā sayyiduy yā rasūl al-lh khudhdh bīday
column3: māluy siwākin walā āūī ilá ḥad

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. inqilāb al-raml. qaṣīdah. mujtathth
al-ṣan‘ah. inqilāb al-raml. tawshīḥ man mashṭūr al-raml

column2: kull man yahwá walā yahwá al-rasūl
huw bāb al-lah mā tamm wuṣūl
yā ḥayāt al-qalb yā qūt al-nufūs
lam tazal tasqī al-qulūb min al-ku’ūs

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. inqilāb al-raml. qaṣīdah. mjzū’ al-raml li‘abd al-ghanī al-nābulsī
